submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        results = []
        starts = SortedList([i for i in range(n - 1)])

        for u, v in queries:
            start_idx = starts.bisect_left(u)
            end_idx = starts.bisect_right(v - 1)

            if (start_idx > 0 and start_idx < len(starts) and starts[start_idx - 1] < u < starts[start_idx]) or (start_idx == len(starts) and u > starts[-1]):
                results.append(len(starts))
                continue
            del starts[start_idx:end_idx]
            starts.add(u)
            results.append(len(starts))

        return results
